'''Beyond Bree 1988 Tolkien Calendar''' was published by the [[American Mensa Tolkien Special Interest Group]] and edited by [[Steve Deyo]]. It contains black and white illustrations by eight different artists.

{{Beyond Bree (calendar)nav| 1987 Tolkien Calendar| 1989 J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar}}

* Dimensions: 11 x 8.5 inches
* Stapled to open out to 11 x 16 3/8 inches; envelope
